citations.desc: Information as to business; furnishing of same by dealers, exhibitors, operators of auction sales, intermediate handlers, and carriers.
citations.narrative:
During inspection, existing records pertaining to animal acquisitions and dispositions were unavailable for review. Failure
to furnish these records may compromise enforcement of the relevant regulations of the Animal Welfare Act. The facility
must assure that any records pertaining to dealer business are available for inspection within a reasonable time.
Correct by February 26, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.125 
   
Information as to business; furnishing of same by dealers, exhibitors, operators of auction sales, intermediate 
handlers, and carriers. 
During inspection, existing records pertaining to animal acquisitions and dispositions were unavailable for review. Failure 
to furnish these records may compromise enforcement of the relevant regulations of the Animal Welfare Act. The facility 
must assure that any records pertaining to dealer business are available for inspection within a reasonable time. 
 
Correct by February 26, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
